mapper.insert: insert into addresses (house_number, street_id, city_id, state, zip_code_id, longitude, latitude, landmark_name) values (#{houseNumber}, #{streetId}, #{cityId}, #{stateName}, #{zipCodeId}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{landmarkName})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.house_number, a.street_id, s.name as street_name, a.city_id, a.state, a.zip_code_id, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.landmark_name from addresses a join streets s on a.street_id = s.id where a.id = #{id}
